item.description:
Hello Members,

Women in Business Network and East West Massage Center presents an evening for women.

How often do you take time for yourself?  We forget how important it is to take care of our needs and do something for ourselves.  Join us for a Girls Night Out in a cozy retreat for the body and mnd.

The evening will incude sample massages, tours of the sauna and educational talks given by massage therapists of the Eastern and Western massage therapy styles.  Refreshments will be provided. 

A special promotion is offered to attendees of the event.

Hope to see many of you there!

Betty
item.name: Girls NIght Out with East West Massage Center
